Description:
As Neat as a Pin in Ideal Location!
Take note of this brilliant opportunity to secure what could be your new home! Nestled in a well-established pocket of Leopold, sits this charming property that has been meticulously looked after and cared for. Conveniently located within walking distance to the Dorothy Street Shops on substantial allotment of 651m2 approx., you are sure to be impressed.
This residence has been designed with convenience in mind, posing a very comfortable floorplan that offers plenty of space inside and out. Offering three sizable bedrooms all with built in robes, main with private powder room, while remaining bedrooms utilise fully fitted central bathroom.
The updated & fully functional kitchen contains all stainless-steel appliances; wall oven, brand new Dishlex dishwasher, gas stove top and range hood. Offering ample bench space and storage cupboards. Completing the floorplan inside is two separate living areas, perfect for family living, a formal dining room and a sizeable laundry with external access.
This delightful home enjoys the comfort of reverse cycle split systems (x2), a gas heating wall furnace and brand-new window furnishings throughout. Also featuring an undercover carport, a garden shed for extra storage and an outdoor studio/ workshop which has been fully lined and carpeted for the upmost comfort. The generous yard is completely secured with a brand new high front fence providing the upmost security and privacy, and a perfect place for the kids to enjoy!
Within walking distance to local shops, a short drive to local schools and the wonderful Leopold Gateway Plaza, you won't want to pass on this opportunity.

Description:
Genuine Family Home
Intelligent and very unique by way of design, this immaculately maintained home is nestled in a desirable locale coupled with an expansive floor plan that makes it ideal for the growing family.
Entering the home you will be greeted and wowed by the spacious and light formal dining and living area which boasts a cathedral ceiling and cosy fireplace.
Step through from here to the central kitchen that has been tastefully updated and is complete with quality appliances and plenty of cupboard space. This overlooks the family meals and second sitting area. Beyond this, you will find a large, light filled third living / rumpus area that flows out onto the deck. It also features a large storage cupboard and enjoys a stunning view back across Geelong.
Outside you will instantly be impressed with the expansive decking area wrapping around the back of the home, allowing you to entertain with absolute ease and with complete privacy. This overlooks the spacious backyard with plenty of space for kids and pets.
Completing the home is three bedrooms plus a large home office or study with built in desk that could easily become a fourth bedroom if needed. The master bedroom is complete with its own updated ensuite. The main bathroom has also responded well to modern transformation and comfortably services the rest of the home.
Features:
Double carport
Double gate access to the backyard
Ducted Heating
Evaporative Cooling
2 x water tanks
Fire place with wood storage
Under house work shop and further storage space

Description:
As Good As New
Why build when you buy this delightful 4 bedroom home and move straight in?
- 4 bedrooms with built in robes, master with walk in and full ensuite.
- 2 living rooms including formal lounge and open plan family room.
- Ducted heating and RC/AC for year round comfort.
- Beautifully appointed kitchen with walk in pantry.
- Double remote control garage with internal access perfect for rainy nights.
- Expansive north facing rear deck ideal for summer entertaining.
- Private and picturesque backyard that cant be overlooked.
- Low maintenance established gardens.
Located within easy reach of schools, public transport, shops and sporting facilities, this home represents outstanding value.

Description:
Exceptional quality with amazing views
Searching for your dream home? Then look no further you will truly be proud to call this property home. Built in 2011 by Metricon, this is the perfect choice for a family that enjoys entertaining and a relaxed yet stylish lifestyle, surrounded by all amenities and only 15 minutes from Geelong CBD and coastal areas. Comprising 38 squares of living space over two levels, all rooms are of large proportions providing a feeling of space and grandeur throughout, this is certainly luxurious living on a grand scale.
The first level offers a guest/5th bedroom with walk in robe, formal lounge plus a light filled open plan kitchen/dining/family area. The kitchen has a freestanding 900mm s/s oven, dishwasher, window splashback, stone benchtops and impressive large walk in pantry. The dining area opens out to the decked alfresco area for combined indoor/outdoor entertaining which can be utilised all year round. Also on this level is the laundry and a powder room for guest use.
Upstairs there are a further four bedrooms, all of generous size. The huge master has a hidden wall of robes, full ensuite with separate bath and shower, toilet and double basin vanity and access to a private balcony where the spectacular panoramic views of Geelong can be enjoyed. There is a third living area on this level, ideal for teenagers or as a parent's retreat and a family bathroom with both shower and bath and separate toilet.
The remote controlled double garage has internal house access, plus there are two additional car spaces in the driveway. Situated on a corner allotment, side gates allow access to the rear yard and further storage for a caravan or trailer. The rear yard has lawn area, the alfresco area and an in ground salt chlorinated, solar heated pool for the family to enjoy on those hot summer days. Allotment approximately 525sqm.
Extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm system, ducted vacuum system, gas boosted solar hot water and plenty of storage throughout.
Arrange an inspection today, homes of this quality are hard to find. Everything you could possibly want is here, why build when you can move straight in and start enjoying all this home offers straight away.
Please note, photos used are to provide a general idea of the property. Inspections are necessary to confirm the internal layout and chattels. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information relating to properties.

Description:
NEAT, SWEET, COMPLETE
Looking for the complete package in a great neighborhood then look no further than this immaculately maintained, established home in central Clifton Springs. Everything you could ask for in this neat package ! A great floor plan and a massive, north-facing outdoor entertaining area suited for use all year round. Easy to maintain with ample parking, plenty of storage options and a compact productive garden. There's nothing that requires work here !
Three bedrooms with modern ensuite and bathroom, lounge and family/dining area adjacent to the updated kitchen. The outdoor entertaining deck adds another dimension to the family's enjoyment all year round. Floor coverings have been updated and the central heating unit and instantaneous gas HWS are almost new. Lofty cathedral ceilings give rooms a light and spacious feel.
Solar panels add to the efficiency of the home and there's even a bit of a view from the front veranda ! Centrally located to Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula inspect now.

Description:
HOME TO RELAX IN
The current owners of this home built it to suit their lifestyle and to enjoy the view. They are ready now to let someone else enjoy. The gardens are well established and complete with drip system, this means the water ends up going straight to the roots and the result speaks for itself. Low maintenance means more time to play golf, go fishing, visit the local cafes and restaurants and even escape north for the winter.
The home has a 'come and relax' feel to it, and with its open plan many people can be in the one space enjoying each other's company.
Comprising two separate living areas, three generous bedrooms, open plan kitchen. There is side access for anyone who wants to park their caravan, trailer or boat. With the choice of two separate outdoor undercover spots no matter the weather you can still experience the fresh air daily.
The Bellarine Peninsula offers so many things to work, live and play. Such as walking tracks, sporting groups, dance groups, schools, medical centres, shopping complexes and public transport. Not to mention the restaurants, cafes etc. Many people are enjoying travelling to work on the ferry from Portarlington to Docklands, too many things to list.
Best you come on a road trip and see for yourself. Then you can book a time to view and see how it might work for your lifestyle?

Description:
Stylish New Single Level Townhouse
Overlooking a park and situated on the corner of a quiet street in Drysdale is a brand, spanking new single-level townhouse. Showcasing contemporary flair and charcoal tones throughout, there is a slick feel to this property.
At the front of the residence is the bright and open living and dining hub that flows out to a courtyard. The kitchen boasts stone bench tops, island breakfast bar, Smeg appliances, textured white subway splashback and ample cabinetry.
Along the hallway there is access to a double lock-up garage and generous linen press. Up two steps to a carpeted slumber zone consisting of three queen size bedrooms, two with built-in robes and master with a walk-in and en suite.
The hotel-style bathroom pulses sophistication with a soaker tub, vanity, speckled concrete tiles and shower. Extra touches include a full laundry, separate toilet, water tank servicing toilets, double glazed windows, block-out blinds and refrigerated cooling and heating.
With this kind of location the lucky owners will be walking to the shops, cafes, heart of town and schools. A perfect downsizer, first-home purchase or addition to a property portfolio. Call Richard for an inspection today!
- Brand new stylish and light townhouse in Drysdale
- Three queen size bedrooms, master with an en suite and WIR
- Low maintenance residence close to shops, schools and cafes
- Ideal downsizer, first-home or savvy investment
- Double lock-up garage, refrigerated cooling and heating
- Only five minutes from beaches and 20 minutes drive into Geelong

Description:
The Ultimate Family Retreat
Located on a quiet street in a friendly neighbourhood, this spacious family home is situated on 800sqm allotment (approx.). Including a warm and inviting ambience, it has been designed for comfort and practicality, offering the ideal base for peaceful family living.
A stunning combination of period features, soothing interior tones and generous room dimensions. This functionable floor plan comprises 4 generous size bedrooms all with robes, master with a walk-in robe and ensuite. boasts two living spaces (one with a charming fireplace), and an additional room which can be converted into either a study, theatre room or a 5th Bedroom. This family home is perfectly positioned for an abundance of natural light with north-facing open plan living, meals & kitchen, effortless connection to the outdoors is achieved with sliding doors to the extended covered alfresco area for year-round entertaining.
Other features include, smeg 900mm freestanding oven & gas cooktop, an island benchtop plus a generously proportioned walk-in pantry combined European laundry, wide garage with internal access and single drive through, ducted heating, split system, high ceilings, floating timber floors, plush carpets, remote controlled DLUG, charming fireplace and plantation shutters in master along with established and low maintenance gardens.
Within close proximity to Drysdale Shopping Centre and cafes, this is a rare opportunity to enjoy the Drysdale lifestyle you so richly deserve.

Description:
Private north facing backyard with bay views
Privacy, charm and tranquillity are words that come to mind when stepping inside this family home. Inspecting this home is a must, as soon as you step inside the front door you realise the potential this property has to offer. The central living area has exposed beams that separates the master suite from the rest of the home.
The large master bedroom impresses with wall to floor mirrored built in robes. A freestanding vanity complements a very generous en-suite that has it's own exterior access into the large north facing garden.
Kitchen features include a five burner gas stove, dishwasher, breakfast bar, bay views and an enormous walk in pantry. The size and open plan aspect of the dining and family area allow for an arrangement of furniture layouts. You can relax in front of the gaslog fire and enjoy the views of the garden through the wide north facing windows.
The second and third bedrooms are serviced by a central bathroom and laundry that includes toilet, vanity and shower.
A large covered outdoor area suitable for summer entertaining is only one small element of this enormous private backyard. Garden boxes and fruit trees pepper the yard, with plenty of space for the family and the dog to run around.
This house is conveniently located in an established area within easy walking distance to the bayside beaches and nearby parklands. Clifton Springs Primary School and the new local playground are only minutes away by foot. Curlewis shopping centre is just a short drive away and further afield are the fabulous attractions of the Bellarine.
Features include
- A lock-up garage
- Three water tanks
- Separate parking in the front yard
- Solar gas boosted hot water
- Under-floor heating throughout the property
- An impressive 23.5 meter frontage

Big, bright, bold and beautiful
Quality home in a quiet court and set on a substantial allotment with both living spaces having north-facing windows and bathed in sunlight. Big garage with drive through access to a huge yard. Quick access to Bellarine Highway and local Ash Rd shops.
Three good sized bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR
Two family living zones, both bathed in northerly light
Bay windows and patio doors out to the spacious rear yard

Description:
Move In And Enjoy!
The Feel:
Set in a great position near schools & shops, this as new home boasts dual living areas, open plan design & 4 bedrooms. The kitchen incorporates a generous island bench, stainless steel appliances & a walk-in pantry, overlooking the meals area which leads to a covered alfresco area. The master bedroom has a large WIR & en suite, & a central bathroom services the other 3 bedrooms. Ducted heating, DLUG & double gates to the rear for caravan or boat storage make this a must-inspect.
The Facts:
-Well-presented brick veneer 4-bedroom family home
-First impressions of neat well-kept garden & covered portico entrance
-Open plan layout with lovely treed outlook from kitchen, living and meals area
-Sliding doors to north-facing covered outdoor living area, large lawn & boundary plantings
-Carpeted 2nd living area offers relaxed lounge or versatile games room/rumpus
-Light, bright spaces, with tiled entry, hall & main living + carpet to all bedrooms
-Quality s/s appliances; 900mm electric oven, 5 burner gas cooktop, dishwasher + walk-in pantry
-South-facing Master with double door entry, en suite & roomy walk-in robe
-3 more well-appointed bedrooms with BIRs to accommodate a growing family
-Main family bathroom with bath & shower, Tastic heater, plus separate toilet
-Ducted heating throughout
-Fantastic location close to all facilities & within the ever-popular school precinct
-RC DLUG w/ TV point & rear door access
-Double gates provide practical OSP in the backyard for cars, boat or a caravan
The Owner Loves.
We love the privacy of our sunny backyard, and its a great neighbourhood with easy access to schools, reserves, shops & beaches.

Description:
The Ideal First Home, Investment or Downsizer!
If you've been dreaming of low-maintenance living but still need room to store a caravan or boat, then this home is the one for you! Presenting a fantastic opportunity for first homebuyers, investors, and downsizers alike, you'll need to act quickly to secure this Leopold gem!
Tucked away in a peaceful pocket, you'll love that this location still places life's conveniences within easy reach. The local parkland and Bellarine Rail Trail are only a short walk away, along with the popular Leopold Sportsmans Club. The Gateway Plaza is conveniently close by for all of your shopping and dining needs, while the nearby Leopold Memorial Reserve sporting grounds will delight fitness enthusiasts. Young families will appreciate easy access to the Leopold Primary School and Leopold Community Hub. Public transport is moments away, while superior access to the Portarlington Highway makes traveling to Geelong or the Bellarine Peninsula a breeze.
Inside, the tidy interiors leave you nothing to do except move in and enjoy. The generous open plan living zone flows onto the north-facing alfresco - creating an indoor-outdoor flow that is perfect for everyday living and hosting loved ones. Home to mod grass, the alfresco grants you the option to soak up the sunshine or kick back under the shade.
The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a large built-in pantry, stainless steel slimline dishwasher, oven, gas cooktop, and rangehood.
Zoned to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and direct access to the bathroom. Two additional bedrooms are complete with built-in robes, with the third bedroom offering versatility as a study or home office. The bathroom is graced with a large shower, bathtub, and single vanity. The separate toilet and European laundry (complete with F&P washing machine) adds the finishing touches to the layout.
You'll be in comfort all year long thanks to ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner, and ceiling fans.
Mod grass and easy care gardens surround the home, leaving you free to enjoy the more important things in life. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while side vehicle access is ideal for storing a caravan, boat, or trailer.
Offering low-maintenance living with a few extra perks, this home will impress! Inspect ASAP!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Charming home in a quiet pocket of Leopold.
Standing proudly in a quiet and flourishing pocket of Leopold, this unique and delightful, character home is sure to impress. Behind the charming period facade are contemporary comforts and quality finishings throughout. Designed and built to capture beautiful sunset views over the region and Geelong, this home offers 3 Spacious Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, a double garage and a secure and private backyard, perfect for young families.
Once inside, you will notice that the property has been meticulously maintained and styled with love and charm. The open plan Living, Dining and Kitchen is light-filled, and offers views over Geelong. The Kitchen offers plentiful storage, 900mm stainless steel cooktop and oven, high quality cabinetry and a lovely outlook to the side of the property. A second cosy lounge room adjoins the hallway, offers a gas log fire, and is a relaxing space to kick-back after a long day.
Accommodation is exceptionally well-appointed, with a grand master bedroom with large walk in robe and lavish ensuite with double vanity and double shower. Two more spacious bedrooms both offer large built in robes and are serviced by a large main bathroom with separate toilet.
Outside, the alfresco area provides a great place to entertain, and overlooks a beautiful side courtyard with established greenery. The backyard provides plenty of space for the kids to run around and is private and secure perfect for pets.
Noteworthy features include:
- L.E.D lights throughout.
- Split system air conditioning to main living and master bedroom.
- High ceilings throughout (2.9m approx).
- 16 solar panels.
This charming property is located within 5 minutes of Leopolds Gateway Plaza, just 15 minutes to the Geelong Waterfront, 10 minutes to the Bellarine Peninsula, and with easy access to some of Geelongs finest schools, this feature-packed property showcases the superior blend of convenience, practicality and character , in one of Geelongs most popular suburbs. Enquire today!

Description:
BRIGHT FAMILY HOME & ROOM FOR THE BOAT!
Situated in a quiet cul de sac in Clifton Springs on a 558m2 parcel of land with both Drysdale and Curlewis shopping hubs in close proximity is this fabulous home barely a year old with wonderful potential to be further enhanced by adding your own personal touches! Featuring ducted heating throughout the home, 4 generous bedrooms including Master with WIR and ensuite, a fantastic kitchen with WIP, open plan dining and living area with ceiling fans and split system plus direct access to both the side and rear gardens allowing for an abundance of light & making the most of an indoor/outdoor lifestyle.There is ample storage space with double car accommodation plus side access for storage of a boat or caravan. This is the ideal home for those looking to enjoy the Bellarine lifestyle with pristine beaches and award winning wineries just down the road!

Description:
Open Cancelled.
On offer here, in a popular pocket of Leopold, this two storey home is all about wide-open spaces and effortless, modern style.
At the heart of the home, the open plan kitchen with stone benches offers 900mm oven and cooktop, a large walk-in pantry and overlooks the dining and main living area. Family time is the focus of the wide, open ground floor, where you can catch up with your kids over dinner, then head to one of 3 adjoining living areas, including the main living, front lounge, or theatre room, to relax and unwind after a long day.
All of this plus an extra lounge room upstairs means having friends over after school or relatives overnight has never been easier.
Offering four spacious bedrooms, all with walk-in robes, this property truly defines space and privacy for all family members. The enormous master bedroom captures the northern sun and offers a walk-in dressing room and lavish ensuite equipped with double shower, double vanity and spa bath.
The decked alfresco provides a great space to entertain guests and the backyard is the perfect blank canvas to create what your heart desires.
Notable features include:
- A large study on the ground floor.
- Powder room off the main living area.
- Four living areas.
- Ducted heating throughout.
- Evaporative cooling.
- Double garage.
- Views over Connewarre.
- Gated side access for boat or caravan.
Located within minutes to the Gateway Plaza, public transport, schooling, sporting ovals, and walking tracks, this property is the perfect blend of space and convenience.

Description:
A Rural Retreat Awaits In Leopold!
Set upon approx. 5 acres, this property has something to impress everyone! From picturesque gardens and a swimming pool, to a four-car shed and four paddocks, youll need to act swiftly to secure this ultimate lifestyle property!
With the conveniences of Leopold only a short drive away, families will appreciate that theyre close to kindergartens, Leopold P.S, and the Gateway Plaza. Lake Connewarre is moments away for outdoor activities, while your weekends will be filled with day trips to the scenic Bellarine Peninsula. To top it all off, the Geelong CBD is within easy reach.
The brick home features a solar-passive design to maximise its northern aspect. A Trombe wall acts as a thermal mass in the living areas, while all of the bedrooms and bathrooms feature a raked ceiling with north-facing highlight windows. Exposed Oregon beams and exposed brick walls add character to the interiors.
Both the open plan living zone and adjoining lounge flow onto the spacious yard for breezy indoor-outdoor living. Parents will appreciate that they can keep an eye on young ones playing as they relax under the shade of the ornamental grapevine. The updated kitchen will delight with stone waterfall benchtops, stone splashback, and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas hob, canopy rangehood). The breakfast bar is perfect for casual dining, while ample storage includes a built-in pantry.
Complete with an updated en suite and separate toilet, the Master Bedroom offers a private retreat for busy parents. Three additional bedrooms (one with built-in robes) are tucked away in a separate wing, while the updated bathroom and laundry complete the layout.
A slow combustion wood heater and split-system air conditioner provide additional comfort.
Outside, exquisite gardens create a wonderful sense of privacy while also zoning the secure grounds into functional areas. Home to a pond, plus a range of beautiful plants including a Queensland Bottle Tree and Silk Tree, every inch of the sprawling gardens will astound. Entertainers will be in their element with the spacious lawn leading to the fire pit and alfresco. Showcasing a pizza oven and direct access to the solar-heated swimming pool, the alfresco sets the scene many gatherings with loved ones.
Other features include an orchard, olive grove, 3KW of solar panels, 25 000L of rainwater storage, and an automated sprinkler system to the veggie garden and greenhouse. The four paddocks (three with troughs) will appeal to hobby farmers and horse enthusiasts alike.
The lock-up four-car garage and large garden shed complete the property, while the grounds offer plenty of room for additional vehicle storage.
Dont miss this opportunity to embrace rural living on the gateway to the Bellarine Peninsula!

Description:
The Beauty of Space & Privacy on 1 Acre!
The Feel:
Tucked neatly into a picturesque and private lane in the coveted Moorefield Park Estate in Wallington, this gorgeous homestead offers just over an acre for growing families to spread their wings and enjoy the rare commodity of space. Shrouded in beautiful, yet low maintenance gardens and well equipped for tradespeople or hobbyists, this property is a lifestyle change you won't look back from.
The Facts:
-Just over 1 acre of private space
-OP living, kitchen and dining with stunning garden outlooks
-Kitchen offers dual wall ovens, gas cooktop and dishwasher
-Direct access to sunny outdoor alfresco area for entertaining
-Privileged north orientation allows for plenty of natural light
-A clever floor plan allows for flexibility dependant on lifestyle
-Internal study/4th BR, plus additional office and workshop
-Secondary living zone/formal dining area for larger families
-Capacious master suite with large WIR and en suite bathroom
-Further 2BRs separately located, sharing the main bath
-Sensationally sizable laundry/utility room with built in storage
-Yamaha surround sound system to living and utility room
-Gas log fire, gas ducted heating, R/C air conditioning & ducted vac
-Hot water service with temperature control panel - set the temp to avoid scalding
-One acre (approx.) of well maintained, low maintenance land
-Vegetable gardens and citrus trees offer semi sustainability
-Beautiful timber verandah, pergola with weather blinds and water feature
-Dual rainwater tanks for garden irrigation and mains backup
-DLUG, separate carport and seperate workshop with space for additional 'toys'
-JG King built- steel frame construction for peace of mind
-Security lighting to house & workshop
-Slotted spouting to the guttering for flooding prevention
-Access to the Estates' floodlit Tennis Court and Clubroom
The Owner Loves....
Ive really enjoyed the quietness of this location. Its so peaceful and Im surrounded by wonderful neighbours. Having lived here now for around 18 years, its the security and sense of home that I have enjoyed the most.

Description:
KIDS LOVE COURT LIVING, RESERVE NEXT DOOR A BONUS
Quiet court location with a large alfresco area designed for family gatherings. Come and enjoy regardless of the weather. Do you have a green thumb? Then you will have pleasure in tending to the garden.
With a reserve right next door at the top of the court there is no problem with the ball going over any fences. This home would suit a family or downsizers looking for a quiet life and somewhere to walk the dog. Investors could do well to consider this property for their portfolio also. Well maintained home comprising two living areas, one with open fire for those cold winter nights or âjust because.â Three bedrooms all with built in robes. Raked plastered ceiling in the second living area makes the home feel bigger.
Leopold now boasts a very extensive Shopping complex with plans to be expanded. Bunnings, Coles, Aldi and a variety of specialty shops. Only a ten minute drive to Geelong and a stonesâ throw from enjoying the Bellarine Peninsula which offers wineries, restaurants, cafes, ferries, walking tracks and the list goes on.
Canât wait for you to book a time to inspect, you will not be disappointed.

Address: 132 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Cosy Weekend Retreat and so affordable !
There is a special feel here with this delightful 3 bedroom timber cottage. Light and bright throughout, the kitchen combines with meals, separate lounge room and three generous bedrooms, two with BIR'S, central bathroom, and laundry. Features include gas log heater, split system air conditioner, polished timber floors, period features, washing machine, new fences and plenty of storage. The rear decking provides for outdoor entertaining. Off road parking for 2 vehicles and room to add carport STCA. Land size 442m2. A low maintenance getaway to enjoy the bay and wineries.
